method: Combine all ingredients and cover the meat, fish or vegetables. Leave in a cool place.  Add salt just before starting to cook and use the marinade to baste whilst cooking.
ingredients: 6tbsp/90ml virgin olive oil,  3 tbsp/45ml wine vinegar or lemon or lime juice,  2 cloves garlic, chopped,  small bunch each of 3-4 herbs e.g. parsley, coriander, thyme, sage or savory, chopped ,  1 tsp/5ml coarsely ground black pepper
